page.title: 04RECREATION IN STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: STOCKSBRIDGE HAS A SPORTS CENTRE WITH SWIMMING POOLS AND FACILITIES FOR SQUASH, BADMINTON, BOWLS, JUDO, GYMNASTICS, ARCHERY, TRAMPOLINING, BASKET BALL AND CRICKET. STOCKSBRIDGE OLD CLUB HAS A CRICKET TEAM. BSC HAVE FOOTBALL AND CRICKET CLUBS. THE FIREMEN HAVE A CRICKET CLUB, OXLEY PARK FOOTBALL AND STOCKSBRIDGE JUNIORS PLAY AT BRACKEN MOOR. ON LINDEN CRESCENT THERE ARE TENNIS AND BOWLING FACILITIES. OTHER CLUBS INCLUDE THE HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY(WITH AN ANNUAL SHOW), A BIRD SOCIETY,PHOTOGRAPHY CLUB AND LUNCHEON CLUB FOR THE ELDERLY. THE KENWORTHY SOCIETY GIVES LECTURES ON LOCAL HISTORY AND MANY OTHER COURSES ARE HELD AT THE COLLEGE.
